item.title: Switching to Wayland
item.description: Hello! 11 days ago I switched from x11 to wayland, because 60 FPS scrolling is a feature too good to miss. Now what is wayland, you may ask? Wayland is like a replacement to the traditional x11 display protocol. You can read more about it here. My x11 setup consisted of the following software: DWM as the window manager. Polybar as the status bar. Dunst as the notification daemon. ST as my terminal emulator.
